fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 99.30 points or 0.54% to settle at 18,598.65. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 3.34% to 12.30. Reliance Industries (RIL), HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
